sentence.Network_en: Very few cyanobacterial toxins have actually been isolated and characterized to date.
sentence.Network_cn: 蓝藻毒素其实一直很少孤立和特点至今.

sentence.Network_en: No cyanobacterial toxin was determined in leek and soil, suggesting that the safety of cyanobacteria fertilizer.
sentence.Network_cn: 韭菜和土壤样品中未检测出藻毒素含量, 表明使用蓝藻有机无机复混肥对植物和土壤是安全的.

sentence.Network_en: Cyanobacterial toxins are the naturally produced poisons stored in the cells of certain species of cyanobacteria.
sentence.Network_cn: 蓝藻毒素是自然产生的毒药存放在细胞的某些物种的蓝藻.

list.abs: 蓝藻水华(cyanobacterial bloom)的频繁发生目前已经成为国内外普遍关注的水环境污染问题,而近期在我国无锡太湖、安徽巢湖和云南 …

means.word_mean: 1. relating to or caused by photosynthetic bacteria of the class Cyanobacteria
